turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Hello. Can you help me order a cup of coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi,how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I want drinks from Starbucks Espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just need a dark coffee with no sugar and with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want black coffee with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, where would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm in New York City right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm at 1500 Broadway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll find starbucks near you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'll pick it up from 1500 Broadway. There's a Starbucks there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say brooke way?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, 1050 Broadway. There's a Starbucks there. I will pick it up from there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order there, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a black coffee with whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on 1500 brooke way.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. So, how long is this going to take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 4 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you very much. Yeah, that should be all for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
